title: Spicy beef empanadas
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 spring onion, chopped', '2 large onions, chopped', '2 medium red peppers, diced', '500g veal shoulder, diced', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 hard boiled eggs, chopped', '24 empanada pastry discs', '1 egg, beaten']
